revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Sagemcom |model=F@ST 3965CV |revision= |asin=B00K94JN6E |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/14/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=VW3FAST3965CV |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ikanos |cpu1_model=IKF7185;IKANOS, Fusiv 185-SE Family, Major Revision: 2; |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F1G08ABADA |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Elpida |ram1_model=E1116AJBG |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9382 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9580 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=7C:03:4C |oui_eth=7C:03:4C }} {{TagLine|Wireless Residential Gateway Router}} :[http://www.sagemcom.com/EN/products/communications/broadband-access/broadband-access/sagemcom-fst-39633965.html Product page] {{â€¢}} [http://www.sagemcom.com/fileadmin/bloc_pages_html/Communication/Acces_Hau_Debit/pdf/Datasheet_Fast3963-3965.pdf Datasheet]
This device appears to (or will be) used with [http://www.optimum.com/ '''Cablevision''''s Optimum service]. :The FCC photos show the device using '''JAMICON''' electrolytic capacitors.
The default SSIDs on the unit in the FCC manual are listed :as '''Sagemcom-2G4-XXXX''' and '''Sagemcom-5G-XXXX''' The FCC sample label specifies the MAC as 7C:03:4C (''[[Sagemcom]]'' OUI) {{see also|Sagemcom F@ST 5260CV|Sagemcom F@ST 5250}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Ikanos]] IKF7185 @500MHz MIPS 34Kc ([https://www.yumpu.com/en/document/view/47431596/fusivar-la-fibre/2 FusiV Vx185]) *The Flash chip: ''Micron'' MT29F1G08ABADA (1Gbit/128MB) *The RAM chip: ''Elpida'' E1116AJBG-6E-F (1Gbit/128MB)
===Serial=== * +3.3V. Tx, Rx, GND - near Flash memory
